Texts.Eng: 125% Base Power While Dual-Wielding Shortswords and Grenade Launchers.

An upgrade to Double Jump. Pressing [Shift] + [Space] fires a cannonball towards your cursor that blasts through enemies and explodes on impact with blocks. While aerial, pressing [Space] without [Shift] sends the cannonball flying downwards, in the opposite direction of your held horizontal movement key, allowing you to launch yourself twice. Damage scales with Dexterity. ^red;Grounded Fire Cooldown: 2.5 Seconds. Aerial Fire Cooldown: 0.5 Seconds.
Hits with a Shortsword - Grenade Launcher in hand - grant +50% Power, 10% Energy/Second, and ^green;explosive kills^white; for two seconds.
